page.title: 06 SHOPPING
page.content: Recently, a new large{supermarket}has opened in the area. The store covers { {60,000 square feet}and has car park spaces for 600 cars. There are different kinds of departments for household goods, clothes and food. There are large fridges for frozen food as well as tins and packets on shelves. In the bakery section there is a manager, his assistant and three bakers. A confectionary lady makes the cakes and a man makes the doughnuts. There is also a large butchery area. Fresh fruit and vegetables are laid out so you can choose. Some people work at night to mark on prices and fill up the shelves. Shoppers put their goods in a trolley and take it to a cashier who looks at your goods and enters the prices in a colour coded electronic till. She tells you how much to pay and gives any change.
